' All module results may be collected by students from Registry Services on the day indicated above between noon and 15.30 (except finals which can be collected between 15.00 and 16.00). Any results which have not been collected by 15.30 will be posted 2nd class at 16.30 to the home address on record. (Uncollected finals results will be posted 1st class at 16.15 to the home address on record).
Module results will not be given over the telephone with the exception of finalist degree classifications.
